name: SPACE BOND
description:
Control your B.O.N.D. with WASD and mouse in this space shoot'em up!

While you can shoot to destroy enemies, you can also get close to enemies to attract them to you, turning them into part of your B.O.N.D.! Free firepower and shield? Sure, but there is a catch - the bigger you are, the slower you move!

A GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission.

Game design - @copylion

Godot coding  - @aleksandrbazhin @ferrson

Art - @mscarrotcake @lagmaster4life

Music - @keyto

We know it's nothing near complete but we will keep update it after the jam! Leave us some comments!
